genresAdvancedInfo.name: hokkien pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A genre of pop music that originated in Taiwan and is sung in the Hokkien dialect. Hokkien pop often features upbeat rhythms and catchy melodies, with lyrics that explore themes of love, heartbreak, and nostalgia. The genre has a strong fanbase in Taiwan and Southeast Asia.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
